title: For Sale: T206 Chicago Americans 7 Card Graded Lot

posts.post_title: For Sale: T206 Chicago Americans 7 Card Graded Lot
posts.post_content:

Chick Gandil SGC VG 3
Fielder Jones Portrait SGC 3
Frank Isbell BVG 3
Lee Tannehall No L. GAI 2.5
Billy Sullivan PSA 3
Fred Payne PSA 4 (mk)
Ed Hahn PSA 3


Price for the lot includes shipping. $285

Paypal, Money Orders or Checks.

Email [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions.
